plot: Each week on Drifting with the All Stars, the "Average Joe" gets a chance to learn the art of drifting from world champion drivers from the United States and Japan.
plot_en: Each week on Drifting with the All Stars, the "Average Joe" gets a chance to learn the art of drifting from world champion drivers from the United States and Japan.
plot_es: Each week on Drifting with the All Stars, the "Average Joe" gets a chance to learn the art of drifting from world champion drivers from the United States and Japan.
title: Drifting with the Allstars
